00035         public void PanelEvent(object sender, EventArgs e)
00036         {
00037             Control ctrl = (Control)sender;
00038             PanelIcon panelIcon = ctrl.Tag as PanelIcon;
00039             string sSelectedBand = panelIcon.iconPanel.sBandName;
00040         
00041             // Edit Staff List
00042             if (sSelectedBand == "manager" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "0")
00043             {
00044  
00045             }
00046             // Edit Class List
00047             else if (sSelectedBand == "manager" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "2")
00048             {
00049 
00050             }
00051             // Membership fees
00052             else if (sSelectedBand == "manager" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "3")
00053             {
00054 
00055             }
00056             // Edit Room List
00057             else if (sSelectedBand == "manager" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "4")
00058             {
00059 
00060             }
00061             // Add Member
00062             else if (sSelectedBand == "staff" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "0")
00063             {
00064                 // Creating the child form login
00065                 frm_member mdiFrmMember = new frm_member();
00066                 // Set the Parent Form of the Child window.
00067                 mdiFrmMember.MdiParent = this;
00068 
00069                 // Display the new form.
00070                 mdiFrmMember.Show();  
00071             }
00072             // Member Search
00073             else if (sSelectedBand == "staff" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "1")
00074             {
00075                 // Creating the child form login
00076                 frm_member_list mdiFrmMemberList = new frm_member_list();
00077                 // Set the Parent Form of the Child window.
00078                 mdiFrmMemberList.MdiParent = this;
00079 
00080                 // Display the new form.
00081                 mdiFrmMemberList.Show();  
00082             }
00083             // Class Search
00084             else if (sSelectedBand == "staff" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "2")
00085             {
00086 
00087             }
00088             // Room Search
00089             else if (sSelectedBand == "staff" && panelIcon.Index.ToString() == "3")
00090             {
00091 
00092             }

00111         private void ShowNewForm(object sender, EventArgs e)
00112         {
00113             Form childForm = new Form();
00114             childForm.MdiParent = this;
00115             childForm.Text = "Window " + childFormNumber++;
00116             childForm.Show();
00117         }

00119         private void OpenFile(object sender, EventArgs e)
00120         {
00121             OpenFileDialog openFileDialog = new OpenFileDialog();
00122             openFileDialog.InitialDirectory = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal);
00123             openFileDialog.Filter = "Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*";
00124             if (openFileDialog.ShowDialog(this) == DialogResult.OK)
00125             {
00126                 string FileName = openFileDialog.FileName;
00127             }
00128         }

00196         private void frm_main_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)

00206         private void loadOutlookBarButtons(string sProfile)
00207         {
00208             switch (sProfile)
00209             {
00210                 case "manager":
00211                     IconPanel iconPanel1 = new IconPanel("manager");
00212                     this.outlookBar.AddBand("Management Functions", iconPanel1);
00213                     
00214                     iconPanel1.AddIcon("Edit Staff List", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/staff.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00215                     iconPanel1.AddIcon("Edit Class List", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/addressbook64.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00216                     iconPanel1.AddIcon("Membership Fees", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/14_64x64.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00217                     iconPanel1.AddIcon("Edit Room List", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/Vista_icons_03.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00218                     this.outlookBar.SelectBand(0);
00219                     outlookBar.Show();
00220                     break;
00221                 case "staff":
00222                     IconPanel iconPanel2 = new IconPanel("staff");
00223                     this.outlookBar.AddBand("Staff Functions", iconPanel2);
00224 
00225                     iconPanel2.AddIcon("Add Member", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/staff.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00226                     iconPanel2.AddIcon("Member Search", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/addressbook64.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00227                     iconPanel2.AddIcon("Class Search", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/14_64x64.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00228                     iconPanel2.AddIcon("Room Search", Image.FromFile(Application.StartupPath + "/../../icons/Vista_icons_03.png"), new EventHandler(PanelEvent));
00229                     this.outlookBar.SelectBand(0);
00230                     outlookBar.Show();
00231                     break;
00232             }
00233         }

00235         // Loads form options depending on the user profile
00236         public void ShowUserOptions(string userProfile)
00237         {
00238             switch (userProfile)
00239             {
00240                 case "manager":
00241 
00242                     this.loadOutlookBarButtons("manager");
00243                     this.loadOutlookBarButtons("staff");
00244                     break;
00245 
00246                 case "staff":
00247 
00248                     this.loadOutlookBarButtons("staff");
00249                     break;
00250             }
00251         }
